titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Kings County Republican General Committee meeting minutes 1991.040
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-21T16:08-0500

did.unittitle: Kings County Republican General Committee meeting minutes
did.abstract: The meeting minutes of the Kings County Republican General Committee from 1893-1895, made up of 69 pages in a ledger.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Republican Party (Kings County, N.Y.). General Committee.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Kings County Republican General Committee meeting minutes, 1991.040, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1991.
